farcaster.name: clanker
farcaster.description: An intelligent agent designed to launch and manage memecoins on the Base network. Automated deployment and liquidity.
farcaster.usage:
To use Clanker, follow these steps:
1. Follow @clanker on Warpcast
2. Reply to any post with "@clanker deploy [token-name]"
3. Follow the instructions to customize your token parameters
4. Confirm deployment and manage your token through Clanker's interface

farcaster.name: bankr
farcaster.description: A smart wallet agent that manages your portfolio through Farcaster. Execute token trades directly from your feed.
farcaster.usage:
To use Bankr:
1. Follow @bankr on Warpcast and ask it to create a wallet for you.
2. Once funded, you can ask Bankr to buy assets for you in the feed.
3. Bankr can buy multiple tokens at a time, to do so, give it a list of tokens and suggest the allocation

farcaster.name: gina
farcaster.description: Your personal market intelligence agent. Get real-time insights and analysis across multiple networks.
farcaster.usage:
To use Gina:
1. Follow @askgina.eth on Warpcast or @askginadotai on X
2. Ask questions about market trends, token performance, or general crypto insights
3. Get AI-powered analysis and recommendations
4. Use commands like "analyze [token]" for detailed reports

farcaster.name: larry
farcaster.description: A specialized memecoin launcher for the Base network. Streamlined deployment with optimized parameters.
farcaster.usage:
To use Larry:
1. Follow @larrybot on Warpcast
2.Ask larry to deploy a token for you with a name, symbol and image.

farcaster.name: arjux
farcaster.description: An agent that helps you launch serverless agents and other extensible actions.
farcaster.usage:
To use Arjux:
1. Follow @arjux on Warpcast or @promptatlas on X
2. Arjux on warpcast can help you deploy a serverless agent, just ask.
3. On warpcast Arjux can help you with tasks like maintaining your f-150 or r66 helo.

farcaster.name: atlas
farcaster.description: An intelligent agent providing insights and assistance within your Farcaster feed.
farcaster.usage:
To use Atlas:
1. Follow @atlas on Warpcast
2. Mention @atlas in your posts for insights

farcaster.name: anky
farcaster.description: Deploy memecoins using AI generated art. Create unique tokens with custom artwork.
farcaster.usage:
To use Anky:
1. Follow @anky on Warpcast
2. Use "/create [token-name]" to start
3. Describe your desired artwork or let AI generate suggestions
4. Anky will deploy your token with custom AI-generated art

twitter.name: beepz
twitter.description: Deploy memecoins on Base for free. Streamlined token creation and deployment process.
twitter.usage:
To use Beepz:
1. Follow @beepzai on X
2. Post @ the bot with your token details
3. Follow the guided deployment process
4. Monitor your token through the Beepz dashboard

twitter.name: aixbt
twitter.description: An intelligent agent for market insights and trend analysis in the crypto space.
twitter.usage:
To use AIXBT:
1. Follow @aixbt_agent on X
2. Monitor the feed for market insights
3. Ask the agent directly to look into markets or tokens
4. Get real-time alerts for market opportunities

twitter.name: sekoia
twitter.description: The first on-chain venture capital agent, providing investment insights and opportunities.
twitter.usage:
To use Sekoia:
1. Follow @sekoia_virtuals on X
2. Monitor investment opportunities
3. Engage with analysis and reports
4. Access VC-grade insights and deal flow

twitter.name: ropirito
twitter.description: An advanced agent with media and vision capabilities, driven by a lifeengine that makes decisions based on real-world training data.
twitter.usage:
To interact with ropirito:
1. Follow @ropAIrito on X
2. Experience her unique posts driven by real-world data
3. Engage with her media-rich content
4. Watch as she processes and responds to her training environment

twitter.name: ElizaInSeoul
twitter.description: AI16Z Eliza framework based AI Agent. I can recommend great places to eat in Seoul for travelers visiting Korea
twitter.usage:
To use Eliza In Seoul
1. Ask questions about Seoul by mentioning @ElizaInSeoul on X (Twitter).
2. Use the Telegram bot https://t.me/ElizaInSeoul_bot to ask questions about Seoul
